name: track-time-with-tyme-3
title: Track time with Tyme 3
description: Interact with Tyme 3 to track your time
author: melkstam

commands.name: start-tracker-for-task
commands.title: Track time in Tyme
commands.subtitle: Search any task in Tyme and start tracking time for it
commands.description: This command will let you search for any uncompleted task or subtask in Tyme 3 and start the time tracker for that task.

commands.name: stop-tracking
commands.title: Stop Tracking Time in Tyme
commands.subtitle: Stop tracking the current task
commands.description: This command will let you stop tracking the current task in Tyme
